version_description:
Tap. Pump. Go. with the new Sunoco App.

We're providing a quick update to make it even easier to identify stations that accept mobile payments. More stations are added every week so check the station locator!

Tap. Pump. Go. with the new Sunoco App.

In this release, we’re making it easy to know if special offers are available at nearby locations. The station locator has also been updated to provide an at-a-glance view of nearby locations and if they accept mobile payments.

Tap. Pump. Go. with the new Sunoco App.

This version includes optimizations and fixes for a better app experience.

Tap. Pump. Go. with the new Sunoco App.

This release includes optimizations for stability and better performance.

A big thank you to all of our beta users and for providing great feedback!

In this release, users can now tap to call Sunoco stations from the Station Detail View with an improved station details layout, improved error messaging, and other optimizations for a better experience.
This release includes even more convenience by enabling Sunoco mobile users with the ability to pay from gift cards.

We often release app updates including optimizations and fixes based on user feedback. Make sure you have the latest app to take advantage of the latest features and improvements. This version includes several bug fixes.

We often release app updates including optimizations and fixes based on user feedback. Make sure you have the latest app to take advantage of the latest features and improvements. This version includes a redesigned station locator, a new "Help" section and several bug fixes.

The Sunoco App, now with Sunoco Go Rewards. Save 3¢ per gallon at participating stations when you pay with the newest version of the app.
